nodes.text: Vaxim was a reptavian Bogwing and the pet of the Force-sensitive Togruta Kasuni Tamm. Around the time of the Battle of Yavin, he accompanied Tamm in her adventures, including the search for a Holocron at the Well of Shadows.
Vaxim appears in the introductory story and gameplay example for Fantasy Flight Games' roleplaying game book Star Wars: Force and Destiny Core Rulebook.
